# cook your code here
N = int(raw_input())

for i in range(N):
    final = []
    length = int(raw_input())
    array = map(int, raw_input().split())
    array.sort()
    low = 0
    high = length - 1
    for j in range(length):
        if j % 2 == 0:
            final.append(str(array[low]))
            low += 1
        else:
            final.append(str(array[high]))
            high -= 1
    print ' '.join(final)
